Name: Hot Roads
About the game: 'Hot Roads' is an arcade motorcycle racing game. You are driving a fast motorcycle on an endless highway with heavy traffic. Your task is to drive as far as possible, dodging oncoming cars and accelerate using nitro. The further you go, the more often you will encounter interference. In the event of an accident, you will start over. Good luck on the hot roads.
